ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] A recent group I was in
ygData.msgSnippet: I had a similar fun experience on Tarew Marr a while back. My cleric was in SK fighting at KFC and picked up with three guildmates from a guild named
ygData.messageBody:
I had a similar fun experience on Tarew Marr a while back. My cleric was in
SK fighting at "KFC" and picked up with three guildmates from a guild named
"Seigneurs de la Lune Noire". It turns out they were all French Canadians
from Quebec. Two of them spoke very little English, while one of them was
fluent in both English and French.

I decided to dust off my rusty college French (don't ask how long it's been)
and attempt to communicate with them in their native tongue. I know I made a
bunch of grammatical errors, but they seemed to really enjoy my efforts and
I know I enjoyed grouping with them and speaking French with them.

Froondor Oakenbark 48 wood elf druid on Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: "Steven Hulse" <steveh@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, December 14, 2002 12:50 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] A recent group I was in


> Hi everyone!
>
> I wanted to take a moment and tell you about the recent experience I had
in a group over in Lavastorm Mountains.
>
> I was just hanging out over there in the entrance to Najena hunting Fire
Drakes and such outside. It was good leveling and they dropped some decent
coin for a lower level player. Well I havened to meet up with two Dark Elves
from Germany. one spoke no english but the other was able to translate for
her. They asked me to join their group and I did. I have to say that was one
of the funnest groups I have ever been in! I'm kind of a communications buff
so it was very fun for me to watch and read the chat between them. It was
also a good opportunity for me to maybe pick up a few new words!
>
> C-ya!
> Durgaa
> Shizney
> Genmay
>
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
> Steven R. Hulse
> Durgaa: Lvl15 FWE Ranger member of Causality Guild
> Genmay: lvl15 Warrior Member of Causality
> Shizney: Lvl16 Magician Member of Causality
